# Infallible Servant (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (dung from an evil creature)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Exemplars of Evil (WotC), pg. 28

*You rub dung onto your minion’s brow, intoning dark words to bind his life to your cause.*

With a touch, you give a target a powerful motivation to avoid failure. If the target is captured by non-evil creatures or is slain, his body dissolves into foul sludge. The target is utterly destroyed and cannot be affected by any spell or effect that restores life (such as *[[True Resurrection (Spell)|true resurrection]]*) or a semblance of life (such as *[[Animate Dead (Spell)|animate dead]]*) short of *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]* or *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]*.

When the target dissolves, all creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a Fortitude save against the spell’s DC or become [[Nauseated|nauseated]] for 1d4 rounds.

**GM Note**

*Spell Secret:* Succeeding on a [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 35) alters the duration from 1 hour/level to 1 day/level; succeeding on a [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 45) alters the duration from 1 hour/level to 1 week/level; and succeeding on a [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 55) alters the duration from 1 hour/level to 1 month/level.
